name: Ocean-Hued Clam
title: Memories of the Deep: Ocean-Hued Clam
desc: "Bringing hopes and memories from the depths, permeating long-lost civilizations and history, these graceful and exquisite crowns slide into the forgotten rifts with their owners."
inPlayDescription: For every 3 HP of healing your characters receive, this card accumulates 1 Sea-Dyed Foam (maximum of 2).<span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">When this character deals DMG: Consume all Sea-Dyed Foam. DMG is increased by 1 for each Sea-Dyed Foam consumed.

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">When played: Heal the attached character for 2 HP.For every 3 HP of healing your characters receive, this card accumulates 1 Sea-Dyed Foam (maximum of 2).<span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">When this character deals DMG: Consume all Sea-Dyed Foam. DMG is increased by 1 for each Sea-Dyed Foam consumed.(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
